amendment.description: An amendment numbered 28 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to transfer $5,000,000 from the Environmental Protection Agency to hazardous fuels reduction activities within the Bureau of Land Management.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
